title: EVERY GAME CONSTANT DISCONNECT
body:
Literally every game i have stable ping then every 5 minutes lag and disconnect and i know its not my internet as its stable Lost my ranked games due to this will there be a rollback?! or what

Edit: Confirmed that it is happening to everyone on Rogers internet in my area

replies.body:
Same, Toronto, Rogers, normally I get a stable 24.  Going to investigate roger-side to see if I can come up with anything.

[Edit]
Confirmed ISP problem.  It's happening to people playing multiple games, etc.  The only thing I can find Roger wise in terms of updates is "We're aware there's a problem in Ont." on their main website, and a 3 hour ETA on the fix from about 2h ago.  Doesn't seem likely they'll solve it soon.  Seems like it issue started around 12-2 p.m. today (or at least people started reporting it around then).

And Fyi its not firewall because i don t use it. its not my internet because it read 30 ping all across the board as well as CMD using ping 216.52.241.254 -t 
there is legit nothing that has been changed on my computer anywhere all up to date. so i know for  fact its ur game.
it is literally every 5 minutes. disconnect after a constant 30 ms ping
get ahold of your isp it seems like it has something to do with them
Same issue. Rogers in Mississauga, Ontario. Yikes.
We're having the same issue - Rogers near Toronto, Ontario. pinging google and League servers with ping -t. League servers seem to timeout sporadically, every few minutes.
yeah same im in toronto ontario as well with rogers

Rogers ISP has in fact confirmed that they are having some issues with their internet service. If you'd like to stay updated on their progress, you can check out Roger's [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RogersHelps/status/839999412164157441) for more details.

We appreciate your patience while this issue gets worked out!
